com.stardog.stark.io.turtle

Class TurtleParserContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stardog.stark.io.AbstractRDFHandler
      • com.stardog.stark.io.ParserContext
        • com.stardog.stark.io.IOParserContext
          • com.stardog.stark.io.turtle.TurtleParserContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RDFHandler

    public class TurtleParserContext
extends IOParserContext
    A small extension of IOParserContext to maintain the state related to edge property parsing.
    Since:
    7.1.3
    Author:
    Pavel Klinov
